description.english: Killed a monster by leading into the Land of Eternal Motion.

description.turkish: Bir canavarı Sonsuz Devinim Diyarına çekerek öldür.

description.english: Have five active golems.

description.turkish: Yansıma ya da Taklitlerle üç düşmanı aynı anda öldür.

description.russian: Убейте одновременно трёх врагов Отражениями или Миражами.

description.english: Kill an enemy with a Mirror or Mirage.

description.russian: Убейте врага с помощью Отражения или Миража.

description.english: Make a living wall grow outside of a cavernous region.

description.czech: Zabij pět netvorů naráz bez použití speciálních útoků.
description.russian: Поразите 5 врагов в ближнем бою одновременно.

Получите достижение
